name: Car Valley
features: users can order the product,cancel the product,give feedbacks for reviews.The admin users can add a New Admin.Admin Can delete,edit, or update their products and also cancel their user's order.This project has a seperate Dashboard for users and admin panel

name: Travele Travel Agency
features: The users can show the destination where they want to travel.Login options is available.If anyone want to book a destination they must login for further processing.They can also cancel their booking

name: Fitness Gym
features: Users can see the gym services.They can set an appointment.But they must login first.They can also see the upcoming events in different locations.
